dc_description_s: This dataset includes point location data for public schools in Wisconsin for 2022. [This dataset includes point location data for public schools in Wisconsin. The points are placed on or near each school building's centroid. Out of the 2,332 schools listed in the attribute table, 2207 have a physical location while 125 are completely virtual campuses. School data was pulled from the Department of Public Instruction's schools database on February 11, 2022. This data gets updated biannually so for more up-to-date information, please visit the DPI public school directory. Data is current as of February 11, 2022.]
uw_supplemental_s: This is an archived copy of the data held at UW-Madison. For more information and most current data please visit: https://data-wi-dpi.opendata.arcgis.com/
